themes module¶

class themes.Themes(root)¶

Bases : object

This is a class that manages the themes of the game (in the GUI version)

path_to_tame¶
Type

the path to the folder containing the background images

themes¶
Type

list of the names of the files contained in the themes folder

index_of_current_theme¶
Type

the index of the current background image starting from the first file in the themes folder

root¶
Type

main Kivy window which uses this class

change_background()¶

Called when the user wants to change the background image. This is a sequential run through all the images in the theme folder

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

Dominos
